name: Battle Tank Wars 2
description:
Battle Tank Wars 2

Take the driving seat of your own battle tank in this first person arcade war game.

In a similar style to lots of other 1st person shooting games, but you have a bigger gun !

Navigate your tank around lots of exciting levels, shooting enemy tanks and anything else that might get in your way!

Another great from our arcade game series inspired by tank games such as battle zone and tank commander.

This is a fast paced tank game, its easy to play, just dive straight in and start shooing.

Good Luck.
